channel.title: Refcardz on Matt Stine
channel.description: Recent content in Refcardz on Matt Stine

item.title: selenium 2.0 refcard
item.description: Today DZone released my first Refcard: “Selenium 2.0: Using the WebDriver API to Create Robust User Acceptance Tests.” I have been interested in writing a Refcard for a long time but have never pulled the trigger. For whatever reason, I decided to jump on the bandwagon last month. Writing this card was quite a challenge, as it’s difficult to boil down a big topic into only six pages while keeping it useful.
